Source.Name: acpi
Source.Description: Attempts to replicate the functionality of the 'old' apm command on ACPI systems, including battery and thermal information. Does not support ACPI suspending, only displays information about ACPI devices.

Package.Name: acpi
Package.Description: Attempts to replicate the functionality of the 'old' apm command on ACPI systems, including battery and thermal information. Does not support ACPI suspending, only displays information about ACPI devices.
